Title: Revokes the public pension of a public officer who stands convicted on an impeachment
Summary: Revokes the public pension of a public officer who stands convicted on an impeachment; applies retroactively.
LawCode: Amd Art 5 ยง7, Art 6 ยง24, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 7 of article 5 of the constitution, in relation to the public pension of a public officer
